newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Sime Darby upgraded.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Sime Darby upgraded.

text.p: -- J.P. Morgan Securities said on Monday it upgraded its rating for Malaysia's Sime Darby Berhad to market performer from market underperform.
-- Analyst Hatim Hoosenally wrote in a report that the company will see contributions starting in fiscal 1997 from development of luxury bungalows.
-- The company also will see continued growth in sales of heavy equipment and increased plantation output of palm oil.

-- "As a result of these changes we are upgrading earnings per share forecasts by nine and 15 percent respectively in fiscal year 1997 and fiscal year 1998. The earnings per share growth rate in each year is estimated to be 18 and 15 percent."
